name: WeightedFeatureSet
description: Container for a set of features and their associated weights (e.g., a ranked list or a biomarker)

name.name: Descriptive name for the record (e.g., 'p53 KO vs WT ranked list', 'Nat Med 2007 80 probesets')

description.name: Optional, longer description of or comments about record

features.name: Feature identifiers (e.g., Entrez Gene IDs, Affymetrix probeset IDs)

featureSpace.name: UUID indicating the FeatureSpace record corresponding to the values in 'features'

species.name: Scientific name of the species associated with the record, e.g., 'Homo sapiens'
